original_title: IMF agreement for Sri Lanka gets Parliament nod
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The resolution for the implementation of the arrangement under the Extended Fund Facility of the IMF for Sri Lanka passed in Parliament on Friday (28).
Turkey reports that the alleged Islamic State leader Qurayshi has died in Syria
The Super Mario Bros. Movie pass $1 billion at the global box office
Vatican engaging in a peace mission to Russia and Ukraine – Pope
